data.title: Legitimate State Monopoly Over The Means of Violence
data.meta_description: 6.7 Necessary Condition: Legitimate State Monopoly Over The Means of Violence   6.7.1 What is legitimate state monopoly over the means of violence? Why is it a necessary condition?
data.text:
Core actors directly involved in protecting civilians and the state from violent harm (e.g., police and military forces and internal intelligence agencies)

Institutions that govern these actors (e.g., ministries of interior, defense, and justice, and national security councils)
